responses: Y4D Foundation focuses on youth development through education and training.
They offer various programs aimed at empowering young individuals.
You can learn more about their initiatives on their official website.
Katalyst works on improving access to education and vocational training.
Their initiatives include scholarships and skill development workshops.
They collaborate with several partners to enhance educational opportunities.
Seva Sahayog is dedicated to community development and social welfare.
They provide resources and support for underprivileged communities.
Their projects include health camps, education programs, and more.
Our mission is to provide detailed information about NGOs and their initiatives.
We aim to assist you in understanding various social impact organizations.
For donation information, please visit the respective NGO's official website.
Each NGO has specific guidelines and processes for making donations.
NGOs often partner with corporations, government agencies, and other organizations.
Partnerships help amplify their impact and reach more people in need.
